data.message: Do you have a FB coordinator named Vanzant Palema? She contacted me saying I won $500.000 from FB lottery. I'm sure it's a scam but wanted to make sure. Thanks.

replies.message: Hey Connie, thanks for checking in with us. This sounds like a hoax. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1N5CFD7. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Kate
Thank you. They are still contacting on  FB Messinger
take care Mom,for healthy and fitness.
That happened 2 me 2 but his name was  Miller Roger Frederick.

I wanna write on your wall Facebook! Why wont you let me write on your wall!!! I'm only kidding. Actually I just have a question. Will you ever be adding an app to the Xbox One? That would be really cool, but I have noticed that they have mostly their own little world their in that store and I don't want to have to install from other devices. It's just inconveinent.

Facebook why do you have a so called help center. when i post a question i get no response also why do you post whar is on your mind also i get no response. all glitter and just to boost your facebook numbers. my opinion. p.s. you might reply by saying you can't answer to all one billion users. oops i may be right
